description:
First match of the "Deluxe" tournament quarterfinals. Yu-yu vs Urara. To Urara, it feels like a rematch of when she first encountered Vanguard. However, Urara receives support from the people around her and becomes too conscious of wanting to win, and begins to show Yu-yu an unexpected development of the fight...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 響き合う音色[シンフォニー]
